what:
Data to demonstrate the trimNa and trimcovNa function
Description:
  Data for 181 countries from the Uppsala Conflict Data Program and World Bank for the years 2000 to 2019.
  The dataset includes various socio-economic indicators. — conflictdata

title: Remove Rows for Unique Values with Missing Covariates — trimun
text: data frame rows removed unique values missing covariates.

title: Remove Rows for Unique Values with Missing Covariates — trimun
code: if (FALSE) { # Load the trimun package library(trimun)  # Specify the column and covariates unique_column <- "country_name" covariates <- c("GDP", "popdens", "urban", "male_edu")  # Call the function cleaned_data <- trimun(conflictdata, unique_column, covariates) }
